data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Nkhotakota, Malawi.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nkhotakota, Malawi

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Nkhotakota, Malawi to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.section_summary: On average, 9 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Nkhotakota, Malawi.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Nkhotakota, Malawi so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 24,900 people living in the state of Nkhotakota.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Gujarati people might believe through him.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Nkhotakota, Malawi to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 6,055 who are far from you in Nkhotakota, Malawi from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nkhotakota, Malawi has a population of 24,900.

We estimate Nkhotakota has 4,236 people who might know Jesus, 14,610 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,055 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Nkhotakota, Malawi that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.
